wikipedia_page.main: Michael Dallat (11 June 1925 – 25 September 2000), D.D., M.A., S.T.L., was the Titular Bishop of Thala and Auxiliary Bishop of The Diocese of Down and Connor.

response: * Michael Dallat (1925 – 2000) - Titular Bishop of Thala, Tunisia and Auxiliary Bishop of Diocese of Down and Connor
Bishop Michael Dallat, who was lectured in St Mary's, served as principal of St Joseph's and was involved in the amalgamation of the two institutions.

link_mentions.page: Roman Catholic Diocese of Down and Connor
Patrick Walsh (bishop of Down and Connor)
response: He was the Principal Consecrator of Bishop Michael Dallat and Bishop Donal McKeown.

The music is from a manuscript that was in possession of Kathleen Dallat, sister of Michael Dallat of Ballycastle. That manuscript gives Carl Hardebeck as the arranger. It is the same air as the traditional love song The Moorlough Shore.
